Comment: Code for soil characteristics below this surface Provides the link to column 1 of `SUEWS_Soil.txt`, which contains the attributes describing sub-surface soil for this surface type. Value of integer is arbitrary but must match code specified in column 1 of SUEWS_Soil.txt.
